cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Energy and Commerce on July 21, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1550, PREVENT HPV Cancers Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 40 (Wednesday, March 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. CASTOR of Florida:
H.R. 1550.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H1080]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

title: PREVENT HPV Cancers Act of 2021
